recipe.title: Chinese Peanut Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 cup creamy peanut butter (do not use old-fashioned or freshly ground)
instructions: Mix peanut butter, soy sauce and garlic in medium bowl. Whisk in 1/2 cup hot water. Add remaining ingredients; whisk to blend. Season with salt and pepper. Let stand at room temperature 1 hour or cover and refrigerate up to 1 day.
